newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Oppenheimer lowers Rorer.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Oppenheimer lowers Rorer.

text.p: -- Oppenheimer and Co said it downgraded Rhone-Poulenc Rorer Inc to market perform from outperform.
-- The stock was off 3-5/8 to 69-3/8 in New York Stock Exchange trading.
-- In a report, analysts Steven Gerber and Mike Krensavage said the stock had produced the largest year-to-date gains of any other pharmaceutical stock they track.
-- "At this juncture, continuing risks related to currency, the French market and resolution of product recall issues appear to equal near-term upside" in the shares, they said.
-- Rorer is majority owned by Rhone-Poulenc SA.
